verbs.description: [V: Following] [ARG2: his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un] , President Donald Trump told Sean Hannity on Tuesday that the meeting would n’t have happened without his use of “ rhetoric ” ( a.k.a . insults ) .

[ARGM-TMP: Following his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: Sean Hannity] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: that the meeting would n’t have happened without his use of “ rhetoric ” ( a.k.a . insults )] .

Following his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un , President Donald Trump told Sean Hannity on Tuesday that the meeting [V: would] n’t have happened without his use of “ rhetoric ” ( a.k.a . insults ) .

Following his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un , President Donald Trump told Sean Hannity on Tuesday that the meeting would n’t [V: have] happened without his use of “ rhetoric ” ( a.k.a . insults ) .

Following his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un , President Donald Trump told Sean Hannity on Tuesday that [ARG1: the meeting] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] have [V: happened] [ARGM-MNR: without his use of “ rhetoric ” ( a.k.a . insults )] .
